title: Update landing page footer attribution and remove extra heart icon

requirements.summary: Adjust Landing page footer attribution to "by echu ❤️" and remove the heart icon between “with” and “using” while preserving the caffeine.ai link URL/UTM parameters and other English copy.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Landing page, the footer no longer renders a heart icon between the words "with" and "using".
On the Landing page, the footer attribution text is exactly "by echu ❤️" (including the heart after echu).
The caffeine.ai link in the footer remains present and continues to use the existing href format with the same UTM parameters.
All user-facing footer text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Update the footer text: (1) remove the inline Heart icon currently rendered between “Built with” and “using”, including removing its lucide-react import if no longer used, and (2) change the attribution from "by Ishu" to exactly "by echu ❤️". Preserve the existing caffeine.ai link href template and its UTM parameters unchanged, and keep the rest of the footer copy in English.
